name: Alice In 10 Seconds
description:
I hate getting up early 

All I want is get back to sleep, even if it's just for 10 seconds.

Cause In my sweet dreams, there was a fairy land, where I can jump high, talk to animals and make friends with them.

But each time I woke up again, I went a little closer to the mundane life. All the papers works and annoying colleagues are waiting me there.

IS THIS THE REAL LIFE? IS THIS JUST FANTSY? !

Who made this game

Design & program: 古吏尹/Golin

2D Art & Concept Art: BONE-17th

3D Art & Video: RAVEN-ZOMBIE

Control

Level 1&2

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

E to pick up/give items

Level 3

WASD to move

Left mouse button to fire

Level 4

WASD to move

Left mouse button to interact

______________________________________________________________
